text: The men's individual competition of the Golf events at the 2019 Pan American Games was held between August 8 and 11 at the Country Club Villa in Lima, Peru. Fabrizio Zanotti won the gold medal for Paraguay, its first gold medal in the Pan American Games. ==Schedule== All times are PET (UTC−5). {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! medals were determined in a sudden-death playoff. Zanotti won the gold on the first extra hole while Toledo took the silver on the 11th extra hole. ==References== Category:Golf at the 2019 Pan American Games
